ygData.subject: Re: Hollow Skull
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get them from Splitpaw and it is used to combine 2 pieces of a staff for to create a Necro Staff.  Not sure what the name of it is thouhg, hope this
ygData.messageBody:
You can get them from Splitpaw and it is used to combine 2 pieces of a staff
for to create a Necro Staff. Not sure what the name of it is thouhg, hope
this helps

Shadair J'Axx

----- Original Message -----
From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
To: Wizard List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 9:52 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Hollow Skull


> From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
> I just bought a Hollow Skull. Got it on an impulse for 5pp, not really
> knowing what it's for.
>
> It's a container with two spots and a combine button. Does anyone have
> any idea what it's for?
>
> --
> Qenelin
